items.title: Noel Tata to join Tata Sons board, seeks legal advice on retaining posts in group firms: Reports
items.description: Tata Trusts holds 66 percent stake in Tata Sons, the holding company of the Tata group firms

items.title: Rallis India: Solid show in Q2 FY25
items.description: The company is focusing on optimising portfolio and streamlining capacities

items.title: Bharat Forge to acquire AAM India for Rs 545 crore
items.description: The shares of Bharat Forge wa strading at Rs 1,460.25 at BSE and was down by 1% at 2.30 pm. Lincoln International acted as the sell side advisor to the deal.

items.title: Noel Tata takes the reins at Tata Trusts
items.description: Noel Tata has been appointed chairman of Tata Trusts after Ratan Tata's death; Tata Trusts holds 66% of Tata Sons, giving influence over major decisions
